title: help
body:
they stole my second account of lol 
my name was kostAS1243

replies.body: Oh no! Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can. They'll be able to help you get control of your account again and repair any damage that might have been done in the process.
